pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:0.5: 39. The training rule on during the rainy season
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Rājagaha in the Bamboo Grove, the squirrel sanctuary,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.2: the nuns went wandering during the rainy season.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.4: “How can the nuns go wandering during the rainy season? They are trampling down crops and grass, harming life with one sense faculty, and destroying many small beings.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.5: The nuns heard the complaints of those people,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.6: and the nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.7: “How can nuns go wandering during the rainy season?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.8: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.12: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.13: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:1.14.1: ‘If a nun goes wandering during the rainy season, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.1.6: not having stayed put for the first three or the last three months of the rainy season.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.1.8: when the villages are a chicken’s flight apart, then for every next village she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.1.9: When it is an uninhabited area, a wilderness, then for every six kilometers she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.2.2: if she goes on seven-day business;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.2.3: if she goes because something is disturbing her;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.2.6: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc39:2.2.7: The ninth training rule is finished.
